profile.profileDescription: Prototype for the Newport Historical Society

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Display date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: LCSH legacy note
label.description: LCSH term as it appeared in source data

label.name: Library of Congress Thesaurus of Graphic Materials term
GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a drop down with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Exhibition files
label.description: Files or media associated with the exhibition

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: If returned
label.description: Action donor will take if item is returned

label.name: Where and when acquired
label.description: Where and when did the source acquire this lot.

label.name: Supporting documents
label.description: Store files such as Deed of Gift here

label.name: Condition
label.description: Condition of the Object when catalogued

label.name: Cataloger
label.description: The person who originally catalogued the item

label.name: Related materials
label.description: Where to find related material outside the Newport Historical Society's collection

settings.setting: Collection to which a manuscript belongs - must make a selection.
